mapper.insert:
select SEQ_SHARE.nextval from DUAL
insert into SHARE_FREE(SHARE_NUMBER, SHARE_TITLE, SHARE_CONTENT, SHARE_WING, USER_NUMBER) values (#{shareNumber}, #{shareTitle}, #{shareContent}, #{shareWing}, #{userNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT SHARE_NUMBER , SHARE_TITLE , SHARE_CONTENT , SHARE_STATUS , SHARE_READ_CNT , SHARE_DATE , SHARE_WING , S.USER_NUMBER , WU.USER_NICKNAME , WU.USER_ID FROM SHARE_FREE S JOIN WW_USER WU ON SHARE_NUMBER = #{shareNumber} AND S.USER_NUMBER = WU.USER_NUMBER

SELECT S.share_number, SHARE_TITLE, SHARE_CONTENT, SHARE_STATUS, SHARE_DATE, S.USER_NUMBER, SHARE_READ_CNT, USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, file_system_name, file_uuid, file_upload_path, U.USER_STATUS FROM SHARE_FREE S JOIN WW_USER U ON S.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN ( select FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_UUID, FILE_SYSTEM_NAME, SHARE_NUMBER, RK FROM ( select FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_UUID, FILE_SYSTEM_NAME, SHARE_NUMBER, RANK() over (PARTITION BY SHARE_NUMBER ORDER BY FILE_NUMBER) RK FROM share_file ) WHERE RK = 1 ) J ON S.SHARE_NUMBER = J.share_number
ORDER BY S.share_number DESC
